description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Poker Blinds is a Poker Tournament Management Application. Enter your tournament’s details and let Poker Blinds handle the rest! Features: Customisable Blinds, Times, Antes, Chips, Stakes, Stats and Prizes.
description.short: Poker Blinds is a Poker Tournament Management Application. Enter your tournament’s details and let Poker Blinds handle the rest! Features: Customisable Blinds, Times, Antes, Chips, Stakes, Stats and Prizes.
